(:action place ; Place an item into a container or garnish an item
    :parameters (?actor - person ?item - object ?container - object)
    :precondition (and 
        (available ?actor)
        (or 
            (and (inventory ?item) (empty ?container))
            (and (smooth ?container) (power ?container off) (empty ?item))
            (and (in smoothie ?container) (inventory ?item))
        )
    )
    :effect (and 
        (or 
            (and (in ?item ?container) (not (inventory ?item))

(:action blend
    :parameters (?bl - blender ?item - object ?ingredient - object)
    :precondition (and 
        (in ?item ?bl) 
        (inventory ?ingredient) 
        (not (power ?bl on))
    )
    :effect (and 
        (smooth ?bl) 
        (power ?bl on) 
        (not (power ?bl off))
